byline.contributor: James C. McKinley Jr. and Kate Pastor contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A jury has been seated for the retrial of Pedro Hernandez, who is accused of kidnapping and killing 6-year-old Etan in 1979. Opening statements are scheduled for Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Set to Begin in Retrial of Patz Suspect
headline.main: Prosecutors Set to Walk Through Details of Etan Patz Case Once Again

snippet: A jury has been seated for the retrial of Pedro Hernandez, who is accused of kidnapping and killing 6-year-old Etan in 1979. Opening statements are scheduled for Wednesday....
abstract: Prosecutors are set to begin retrial of Pedro Hernandez, suspect in 1979 kidnapping and murder of 6-year-old Etan Patz in SoHo; it remains to be seen whether trial will benefit from missteps of first trial, which ended in deadlocked jury due to lack of evidence.
